resources.string: The song lyrics got lost in the chords!
Sorry, we can\'t find the lyrics. Maybe they\'re hiding behind the notes?
Lyrics search failed. How about we try again?
Somewhere between the verses, the lyrics got lost…
Lyrics not found! Maybe the music is enough?
Searching for lyrics… Unfortunately, they\'ve vanished in the sound!
Oops! The lyrics are hiding. Let\'s try searching somewhere else.
We’re looking, we’re looking, but no lyrics. Maybe they\'ll come with the next chorus!
